ActNational Defence Act
PrecisAppointment of LIEUTENANT-GENERAL JONATHAN H. VANCE, of Ottawa, Ontario, to be the Chief of the Defence Staff, at the rank of General, effective on the day on which the change of command ceremony takes place.
